Item.Header: New Preprint on Koopman-based Stochastic Control
Item.Body: Using the Koopman generator to solve stochastic optimal control problems for meta-stable dynamical systems:

Item.Header: New Preprint on Data-driven Coarse Graining
Item.Body: New Results on Kinetically Consistent Coarse Graining with Koopman Operators:
Feliks is organizing a one-day workshop on UQ for molecular systems at MPI Magdeburg. Dates are August 29-30 at MPI DCTS Magdeburg. Register here:
Feliks will be speaking at TU Chemnitz's Summer School on Applied Analysis 2024.
Feliks will be giving talks at IMSI (U Chicago), SIAM MS 2024 (Pittsburgh, U.S.), Heriot-Watt University (Edinburgh, Scotland), and MTNS 2024 (Cambridge, UK).
